ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked

cookingTips: Crush potato chips in a food processor for consistent texture, or by hand for varied sizes
Mix soup and tuna gently to maintain flake structure and avoid breaking down the fish
Reserve a handful of crushed chips to sprinkle on top just before baking for added crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What simple additions would you suggest to elevate this three-ingredient casserole?
